title: Ticket #7423: Filter private ads for startds the negotiator won't match
description:
When using a collector tree for scalability and NEGOTIATOR_CONSIDER_PREEMPTION is False, the private startd ads for Claimed slots don't need to be forwarded to the top-level collector. The negotiator won't try to match these slots, so the information in those private ads is never used. Profiling shows that this gives us a small performance improvement in the top-level collector.

New config knob COLLECTOR_FORWARD_CLAIMED_PRIVATE_ADS will control this feature. Its default will be $(NEGOTIATOR_CONSIDER_PREEMPTION).
